attributes.description:
2014 LAND ROVER RANGE ROVER EVOQUE 2.2 SD4 HSE DYNAMIC, ONE OWNER FROM NEW, ONLY 87 000 KMâ€™S, FULL SERVICE HISTORY FROM LAND ROVER, SELLING FOR R 439 950.00
So we are huge Land Rover fans, as Iâ€™m sure you all know by now, we just love our selves a clean Landy. My wife has a very beautiful Freelander and we love the vehicle a lot. Itâ€™s one of the best vehicles we have ever owned, and when I came home with this Evoque and she saw it and took it for a drive around the block she wanted it immediately. (I think I may have started a bit of a problem here). To be honest I also wanted to keep it. Itâ€™s like a completely redone high tech Freelander with a mini Range Rover interior. 
This is the top of the range Evoque, the amount of extras and luxurious comforts this car possesses are mind blowing. The huge selling point for me is obviously the extremely low mileage and the full service history from agents. To say this car has been well cared for and maintained is an understatement. Itâ€™s in brilliant condition inside and out. 
It drives like new, looks like new, and is a really impressive example of an Evoque. This is such a fantastic family SUV, if you are in the market for a bigger family vehicle that is extremely capable off road also, please trust me and come through for a test drive in this car. This specific vehicle was owned by a doctor, itâ€™s never done any heavy off roading, and has been used since new as a Sandton 4x4. 
WHAT MAKES THIS CAR SPECIAL?
